abstract.text: Perform calculations across multiple lines

inlineContent.text: Offers many features for working with lines (presumably in a text view) including:
Parsing and evaluating lines, and their dependencies (via line references and variable declarations)
Notifying observers when dependent lines are evaluated
states. You can get a ticket (
) and jump back or forward to any states

topicSections.title: Convenience initializers for working with text views

abstract.text: Add observers to be notified of evaluation, for example of dependent lines

Returns a tuple containing the underlying line sheet, and the evaluator type originally set during its creation
Returns a line collection with no lines, and a minimal customization
Experimental feature, do not enable
A special line reference that always point to the answer of the line directly above the line on which it’s used
Automatically creates and sets lines’ expressions to the lines in the given text

) for a set of lines in the collection (with some options)
